# Expectations and responsibilities {#expectations}

We describe our methods in this chapter.

## Everyone

### Big picture
* Do work that you are proud of. Do work that others will care about.

### Small picture
* Do not come to the lab if you are sick. Stay home and get healthy, and don't risk getting others sick.
